$forceIndependentMatra{$virama →; # Virama cannot appear independently or as first character

$au  → au;

\uE079→;       # CURRENCY NUMERATOR ONE LESS THAN THE DENOMINATOR
\uE07A→;       # CURRENCY DENOMINATOR SIXTEEN
